name: Dune Punk (2021)
description:
Master the dunes as you summon giant sandworms and battle them aboard a wind-powered weaponized sandboard. Collect powerups to gain the advantage in battle, catch dizzying air and maneuver at breakneck speeds, but watch out for enemy marauders who patrol the wasteland with murderous intent!



- Huge area to free roam with  sand monster battle missions and unlockables to find!
- Ability to get ON and OFF the sandglider -- full third person movement added!
-Day/Night progression
- Grind rails and launch off boost pads for maximum speed!
-Additional powerups like advanced firepower and flight!
- Talk to crew members aboard your mobile command base -- the sand catamaran!
- Several camera modes, including first person!
- Replenish AMMO by keeping breakneck speeds and landing insane tricks!
